dataset.title: Flooded forest plot sampling in Peru

address.deliveryPoint: University of Central Oklahoma Department of Biology Box 89

para.literalLayout: In order to better understand how flooding and gap formation affect Amazonian rainforests, I set up plots both in three major forest types that differed by flooding duration (referred to here as dry, wet, very wet) and in their respective gaps.
